text: Vanessa Chantal Paradis (born 22 December 1972) is a French singer, model and actress. She became a child star at age of 14 with the great worldwide success of her single "Joe le taxi". Since 1991, she has been a spokesmodel for Chanel. She was in a relationship with American actor Johnny Depp from 1998 to 2012, and they have two children: Lily-Rose and John "Jack" Christopher Depp III. She is also the older sister of Alysson Paradis, who is also an actress. == Other websites == * * Vanessa Paradis at Universal Music * * Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:French movie actors Category:French stage actors Category:Child actors Category:Child singers Category:Models from Paris Category:Singers from Paris Category:Musicians from Paris
title: Vanessa Paradis
